articles.author: Shubhangi Dua
articles.title: New river flow analysis technique shows the possibility of life on Mars - Interesting Engineering
articles.description: Using satellite images and the equations used to calculate river flow on Earth, scientists estimate that rivers on Mars may have once supported life.
